channel.title: Customize on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Customize on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Overview
item.description: Overview Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Brands: https://developer.okta.com/docs/concepts/brands/ Content type: Explanation Explanations present a more detailed dive into a single topic compared to Conceptual Overviews. They aim to clarify specific elements of the technology, offering developers practical insights or in-depth clarification on particular points of interest.Â For example, there are explanations \ deeper dives into single Okta features:

item.title: Customize your domain name and email address
item.description: Customize your domain name and email address Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Customize domain and email address: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-url-domain/main/ Content type: How-to A How-to document illustrates how to perform a specific task that does not rely on writing code. How-tos tend to walk the reader step by step through administrative tasks but not exclusively.

item.title: Style the sign-in widget (3rd gen)
item.description: Style the sign-in widget (3rd gen) Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - Can we roll this guide up with the other “Style the sign in widget” guide. Also, is the guide for the embedded sign-in widget or just redirect? Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title What does “3rd gen”? Is calling it a “3rd gen” distinguish it from Classic vs OIE?

item.title: Customize email notifications
item.description: Customize email notifications Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Pull the “Use Velocity Templating Language” section out of this document into a new VTL reference doc. See reference for more details. Links to original docs: - Customize email notifications:https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/custom-email/main/ Why is this here?: Based on GroupIt data from Oktane, customers struggled to understand VTL. As a result, a new separate VLT overview doc is being proposed.
